data.actual_result: The game icon appears; however, there is a sliver of a duplicate game icon under the original icon.
data.expected_result: There should be one game icon next to the game's name in the Games tab.
data.short_description: Game icons duplicate at bottom of icon
data.steps_to_repro: - Set Discord's zoom to 67% (setting chat font scaling to 80% may help with repros) - Have a friend play a game that can appear in the Games tab (reproduced with Undertale and osu!, can only be reproduced with some game icons) - Open Games tab - observe
